boardgame.name: 2nd Fleet
Second Fleet
boardgame.description: 2nd Fleet is a refinement of Victory Games (I) popular Sixth Fleet game system, and examines the strengths and weaknesses of the Soviet Red Banner Northern Fleet and the US Second Fleet and its NATO allies in future conflict for control of the North Atlantic and Arctic Oceans. Players are placed in command of the opposing superpower fleets. The mighty aircraft carriers and escorting capital ships must be protected from the devastating firepower of modern missiles, torpedoes, and bomb attacks. Attack submarines threaten the enemy task forces and replenishment convoys while searching out their submerged rivals. Limited air assets must be carefully assigned to combat air patrols, long-range strategic missions and attack strikes. 2nd Fleet, with its multitude of options and strategies, is one of today's most realistic recreations of modern naval warfare on the high seas._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each 8 hour game turn is broken into 3 distinct phases (sub, surface, and air) and each player takes turns choosing which phase they wish to conduct. Ex. if the US player chooses _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;Air_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;, they conduct all bombing, shipping strikes, anti-sub, and interception actions for all their aircraft._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players also use their units to attempt to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;detect_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; enemy forces so that an attack can be made. Ships and aircraft are always detected once a unit moves close enough to them, but players have to roll to try to detect subs._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Optional rules include nuclear weapons and logistics._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;About 10 scenarios are included which range from about 60 minutes (for Introductory Scenarios) to 3 to 6 hours (for Intermediate Scenarios) to 20 or more hours (for the Advanced Scenario)._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Part of Victory Games Fleet Series._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: I_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;ve Been Diced! episode 10: Gateway games

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

Still in shrinkwrap.

2nd Fleet: Modern Naval Combat in the North Atlantic 1986 edition - Victory Games, Inc. This game is in very good shape, and was played only twice. Contents: Rules Booklet Counters: 50% Unpunched; punched 50% in storage tray 2 Charts and Tables Booklets Pad of Logistics Rosters 2 Deployment/Reinforcement Cards 1 10-sided Die Ships USPS Priority Mail; $ depends on buyer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s zipcode. Ships no later than next business day after payment clears.

Unpunched, except 4 counters which fell out in a batch in the box. $10 shipping. Please pay with check or money order.

Game complete, never played, unpunched,no shrink wrap, box in good condtion and slightly scuffed, contents like new. Buyer to play for Priority shipping. Please send zipcode if you would like a shipping estimate. Combined shipping available for multiple items. Optional insurance available for $1.70. FREE delivery confirmation. Currently, I can only accept payment by cashier_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s check, money order, or NON-credit card Paypal transfer. Thanks for looking!

Complete. Partially punched. Components in excellent, played once condition. Box has moderate wear on edges. I store my games in a pet-free and smoke-free environment and package my games for shipment with the utmost care. I ship quickly, within 24 hours of receiving payment. Shipping weight is 7 pounds.

CONDITION: Brand new, in original shrinkwrap - just one small tear in the shrinkwrap on the back of the box. POSTAGE COST: UK postage: £5.50 European Postage: £9.00 Rest of World Postage: £17.50 Any buyers in and around London are welcome to collect in person (cash on collection). COMBINED SHIPPING: I will always combine multiple items to reduce your shipping costs where possible. Please note that it is NOT always cheaper to combine shipping on games outside the UK due to the weight limit of 2KG on the Small Packet service. As a rough approximation, outside the UK it is usually cheaper to combine 5 or more games, while 4 or less are best sent individually. This depends entirely on the specific games - please contact me before buying if you wish to purchase multiple games so that I can give you an accurate shipping cost. ABOUT ME: I have been playing and collecting games for over 25 years and I also sell games and magazines on ebay with the same username (saabdastard) where I have a 100% positive rating and a feedback score of over 4000. I am a verified PAYPAL Premier account holder (since 2004), with over 650 PayPal Verified Buyers. SELLERS TERMS AND CONDITIONS: PAYMENT TERMS: Please wait until you receive my invoice before sending payment. Payment is due within 5 days of the date you receive my invoice. Please do not purchase if you do not intend to pay, or cannot pay within this time frame. PAYMENT METHODS: UK buyers may use PayPal, cheque or cash-on-collection. Overseas buyers MUST USE PAYPAL only. SHIPPING: Buyer is responsible for all shipping costs. Europe and Rest of World rates shown above are for Airmail. Surface Mail rate to Rest of World is available if you wish (same as Europe Air rate), but Surface Mail to Rest of World can take up to 2 months! There is no real difference between Air and Surface rates for Europe. INSURANCE: Insurance is optional on all items, unless noted. Failure to take out optional insurance limits my liability for loss or damage in the mail to the amount automatically covered by Royal Mail (currently £39 per package for Small Packets, £150 for International Standard). CUSTOMS: Buyers outside the EU are responsible for all Customs charges applicable to their country. RETURNS: New Unopened items may be returned for a refund of the purchase price of the item, excluding shipping charges, within 7 days of the delivery date. All returned items must be in the original packaging and in the condition that they were shipped to you. Defective or damaged items can be returned for an exchange or refund within 7 days of the delivery date. All returns require authorization from me BEFORE returning the item.

The game is punched, but neatly sorted in two counter trays (you get one more as a bonus). The counters are in beautiful condition. They pretty much look new. The maps are in very good condition. There were a couple of very minor stains on at least one of them. Also the maps had been taped down at one point, so you can see where it had been removed at the corners. The rulebook has been thumbed through a little bit and a couple of the log sheets have been used. The charts are in excellent condition. The box has a small amount of shelf wear, but the corners are all intact and they are not splitting. For some reason there is an extra southern map in this game. It is the map with Scotland in it.

All but one sheet of counters are completely unpunched. One sheet has about 1/3 of counters punched out (these counters are all present and kept in a small ziploc bag). Maps are in excellent unused condition. Complete Logistics Roster pad also included. Box top shows age, but is in sturdy condition.

Excellent unpunched still in shrinkwrap. All games are 100% checked and details sent to you before paying. All games will be well packed. Buyer pays shipping and optionally insurance otherwise posted at your risk. I do however get a certificate of posting for all parcels. Feel free to ask for more info/details.
counters partly punched, all components including tray and tray cover

Complete, unpunched game: only the shrinkwrap is missing! Box in excellent condition. (Yes, another game bought with the best of intentions many years ago...) Estimated shipping on this is 10-12 euros within Europe, a bit higher to the US.
like new except for counters being punched and sorted pics available on request

Some markers have fallen out of the counter sheets. Extra marker sheet included, as well as a complete extra set of ship/air counters. One US ship has fallen out of the countersheet, but is in the box. One box corner cracked.

The box has some minor wear due to shelf life and being in a shipping box for some time. Am missing the NATO chart, however all other components and pieces are accounted for. This is a good game if you are in need of replacement parts yourself. I can provide pictures of the game and all components if you would like. Simply email me with the request. I ship using flat rate boxes as this seems to be the most cost effective means to shipping these games. If you would like to insure the game then please add $1.85 to the cost.

This is for user: Belz only. This is for 2 complete sets of this series. That means that you get 2 copies of each game: (2)2nd Fleet (2)3rd Fleet (2)5th Fleet (2)Sixth Fleet (2)7th Fleet Condition: The boxes have significant shelf-wear, but are structurally intact and the actual game components are in gorgeous shape. Mostly unplayed (most of the maps have never been unfolded, much less played on) and we have verified that each game is complete (we did not inventory each counter, however). Looking at the condition of the components, I have no worries that all the counters are there.

Punched and sorted in tray. All components in near new condition. Box is undamaged and shows average shelf wear. Will ship in first class or priority box for $10 to U.S. addresses. $18 to Canada. $30 international. I will combine shipping if you purchase other games at the same time. Magazines and non-boxed games can usually fit in the same box so no additional charge. I will send you a postage total on multiple game orders before confirming your order. I’ve rarely had any issues with loss or damage but U.S. post office does not track first class packages once they leave the U.S. so foreign buyers assume all risk of loss or damage.

Second game in the VG Fleet series, and my personal favorite. Not as difficult as the traditional big VG rule book makes it look. Box shows some shelf wear but no splits, dishing, or repairs. Counters are neatly cut, maps and charts are clean. Rules have been neatly highlighted. If bought with my VG Sixth Fleet item, I will combine shipping and take an extra $5 off of the total price. I will insure the item, if requested, for an additional $5 S_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;H of $12 is for US addresses only. I am willing to ship worldwide if you are willing to pay the international shipping charges.

Complete, good player‘s copy. The box however, shows heavy shelf wear. NOTE: The previous owner put adhesive foil on all the counters and the map sheets. Therefore the maps won‘t lay flat anymore and have to be weighed down with glass or plexiglas. ALSO includes a copy of the General magazine with the Bay of Biscay expansion and the rules for the French fleet. Home made counters for that expansion are also included!
